welcome.headline: Welcome to privacy checker.
welcome.description: To start the test you need to login at Facebook first. The script will then load the required data from Facebook on your computer.
welcome.notstoring: We are not storing your facebook credentials neither any extracted data like photos or posts.
welcome.change_and_go: Login as another user and proceed
welcome.checking_profile_status: Checking if you already authorized privacy checker

collect.headline: Examining your facebook profile
collect.description: Before you can test your privacy settings we need to collect some data such as your friends, your pictures, your wall posts and several other things.

select.headline: Collecting test data
select.description: Please select the picture/post which is more private to you

listguess.headline: Time to guess!
listguess.question_friends: How many friends do you have?

entityguess.headline: What do you think? How many people can see the following item?

hangman.headline: Please select the people which can see the following items.

result1.headline: Game #1: __listspercent__% were correct!
result1.advice: Try to reorganize your lists or delete some friends if you have too many

result2.headline: Game #2: __listspercent__% were correct!
result2.advice: Try to make smaller groups or delete some friends if you have too many
